Class DBUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gck.DBUtil

  • public class DBUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for ResultSet to generate TableModels

      • resultSetToComboBoxModel

        public static javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel<java.lang.Object> resultSetToComboBoxModel(java.sql.ResultSet res,
                                                                                          java.lang.String columnName,
                                                                                          java.lang.String firstItem)
        Generates a DefaultComboBoxModel from given ResultSet (given columnName of ResultSet will be used).
        Parameters:
        res - ResultSet to generate ComboBoxModel
        columnName - column name of resultset for fill the ComboBoxModel
        firstItem - first item to included in ComboBoxModel
        Returns:
        DefaultComboBoxModel containing data of 'columnName' of ResultSet
